channel.title: Making server 667/*** public help!
channel.description:
Hello guys I'm having a small problem while trying to make my server which uses Zenithscape source public. It works perfectly fine with Hamachi,however, when I try to make it none Hamachi it never works this is what I did :
So I went to the Zenithscape client and I changed the IP in Loader and in client to my no-ip.duc it did not work and then I tried static IP it also didnot work.
I portforwarded and I entered the portal 43594 perfectly as whatportforward.com guide said at my routar config 192.168.1.1 using my IPV4 address aswell which is 192.168.1.3 then I saved so here is what my portforward looks like:
[img]http://s11.postimage.org/oty6mzgib/pport.png[/img]
I went to the firewall and I allowed the port 43594 to work in both TCP and UDP.
and I tried alot of combinations it still won't work I can't figure out the problem so please if someone can help me on skype add : godaxe1

item.title: Making server 667/*** public help!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Sometimes routers fuck up, and for some reason they just don’t work… happens to me all the time, you COULD try utorrent/bittorrent or this

Read full topic

item.title: Making server 667/*** public help!
item.dc:creator: @cyrofax cyrofax
item.description:
@cyrofax wrote:

Hello guys I’m having a small problem while trying to make my server which uses Zenithscape source public. It works perfectly fine with Hamachi,however, when I try to make it none Hamachi it never works this is what I did :

So I went to the Zenithscape client and I changed the IP in Loader and in client to my no-ip.duc it did not work and then I tried static IP it also didnot work.

I portforwarded and I entered the portal 43594 perfectly as whatportforward.com
guide said at my routar config 192.168.1.1 using my IPV4 address aswell which is 192.168.1.3 then I saved
so here is what my portforward looks like:

I went to the firewall and I allowed the port 43594 to work in both TCP and UDP.

and I tried alot of combinations it still won’t work I can’t figure out the problem so please if someone can help me on skype add : godaxe1
